com.cubeia.firebase.api.service
Interface ServiceContext

All Superinterfaces:
Context
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServiceContextAdapter
public interface ServiceContext
extends Context

Context for services. This context is what the server published towards the services during initialization.

Author:
lars.j.nilsson
See Also:
Context, Service

Method Detail

getServerId

String getServerId()
Returns:
The server id, never null

getPublicId

String getPublicId()
Returns:
The configured public id of the service, never null

getName

String getName()
Returns:
The configured name of the service, or null if not configured

isSingletonServer

boolean isSingletonServer()
Returns:
True if the service reside on a singleton server, false otherwise

getServerHomeDirectory

File getServerHomeDirectory()
Returns:
The current server home directory, never null

getServerConfigDirectory

File getServerConfigDirectory()
Returns:
The specified server configuration directory, never null

getServerLogDirectory

File getServerLogDirectory()
Returns:
The specified server log directory, never null

getParentRegistry

ServiceRegistry getParentRegistry()
This method provides access to the registry to which the service belongs. It can be noted that services should not use each other during the initialization phase. If they do depend on each other for startup they must declare so in their descriptors, please refer to the developers manual for more information.

Returns:
The registry to which the service belongs, never null

getMBeanServer

MBeanServer getMBeanServer()
Returns:
The mbean server used by the server, never null

getServerGameDirectory

File getServerGameDirectory()
Returns:
The game deployment directory, never null

getResourceLocator

ResourceLocator getResourceLocator()
The resource locator is for reading resources from the game archive. This can be used to load configuration etc.

Returns:
A resource locator for the game archive, never null

getDeploymentClassLoader

ClassLoader getDeploymentClassLoader()
Get the class loader used by the server as a parent for specific deployments. In other words, this class loader will be the parent to all deployed game, service and tournament class loaders.

Returns:
The class loader used as a parent for deployment loaders, never null

setNodeListener

void setNodeListener(NodeListener listener)
This method can be called to register the service as a node listener. A null argument removed the listener.

Parameters:
listener - Listener to use, or null to remove
